_source.productDescription:
Catch the GRAMMY® Award-winning global icon LIVE for a massive show at the Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy is among the most significant and groundbreaking African artists in music history, a landmark cultural figure hailed worldwide for his trademark union of Afrobeats, pop, R&B, hip-hop, reggae, and an all-encompassing range of other musical approaches.

The first African artist to have two albums earn over 1B streams on Spotify, Burna Boy has released seven studio albums and has racked up a truly extraordinary list of accomplishments and accolades, including 11 total GRAMMY® Award nominations, 4 BET Awards for "Best International Act" (the first African artist to win the award three consecutive times), a 2023 Billboard Music Award for "Top Afrobeats Artist" and many more.
_source.productShortDescription: Catch the GRAMMY® Award-winning global icon LIVE for a massive show at the Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

productComments.commentText:
Catch the GRAMMY® Award-winning global icon LIVE for a massive show at the Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy is among the most significant and groundbreaking African artists in music history, a landmark cultural figure hailed worldwide for his trademark union of Afrobeats, pop, R&B, hip-hop, reggae, and an all-encompassing range of other musical approaches.

The first African artist to have two albums earn over 1B streams on Spotify, Burna Boy has released seven studio albums and has racked up a truly extraordinary list of accomplishments and accolades, including 11 total GRAMMY® Award nominations, 4 BET Awards for "Best International Act" (the first African artist to win the award three consecutive times), a 2023 Billboard Music Award for "Top Afrobeats Artist" and many more.

브리즈번 엔터테인먼트 센터 아레나에서 열리는 대규모 공연에서 그래미® 어워드 수상에 빛나는 글로벌 아이콘의 라이브 공연을 만나보세요.

버나 보이는 음악 역사상 가장 중요하고 획기적인 아프리카 아티스트 중 한 명으로 아프로비츠 팝, R&B 힙합 레게 등 다양한 음악적 접근 방식을 결합한 그의 트레이드마크로 전 세계적으로 찬사를 받는 문화적 인물입니다.

스포티파이에서 두 장의 앨범으로 10억 스트리밍 이상을 기록한 최초의 아프리카 아티스트인 버나 보이는 7장의 정규 앨범을 발표하며 11번의 그래미® 어워드 후보 지명, BET 어워드 "최우수 인터내셔널 아티스트" 4회 수상(아프리카 아티스트 최초로 3년 연속 수상), 2023년 빌보드 뮤직 어워드 "최고 아프로비츠 아티스트" 수상 등 놀라운 업적과 찬사를 받았습니다.

Retrouvez l'icône mondiale primée aux Grammy® Awards en direct pour un spectacle grandiose à la Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy compte parmi les artistes africains les plus marquants et les plus révolutionnaires de l'histoire de la musique. Une figure culturelle emblématique, saluée dans le monde entier pour son mélange emblématique d'afrobeats, de pop, de R&B, de hip-hop, de reggae et d'une multitude d'autres styles musicaux.

Premier artiste africain à avoir cumulé plus d'un milliard d'écoutes sur Spotify avec deux albums, Burna Boy a sorti sept albums studio et cumule un palmarès exceptionnel, avec notamment 11 nominations aux Grammy® Awards, 4 BET Awards dans la catégorie « Meilleur artiste international » (le premier artiste africain à remporter ce prix trois fois de suite), un Billboard Music Award 2023 dans la catégorie « Meilleur artiste afrobeats », et bien d'autres encore.

Non perdetevi l'icona globale vincitrice di un GRAMMY® Award, dal vivo per un imponente spettacolo alla Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy è tra gli artisti africani più significativi e innovativi nella storia della musica, una figura culturale di riferimento acclamata in tutto il mondo per la sua inconfondibile unione di Afrobeats, pop, R&B, hip-hop, reggae e una gamma completa di altri approcci musicali.

Primo artista africano ad avere due album che hanno superato il miliardo di stream su Spotify, Burna Boy ha pubblicato sette album in studio e ha collezionato una lista davvero straordinaria di successi e riconoscimenti, tra cui 11 nomination totali ai GRAMMY® Award, 4 BET Awards come "Best International Act" (il primo artista africano a vincere il premio per tre volte consecutive), un Billboard Music Award 2023 come "Top Afrobeats Artist" e molti altri.

ブリスベン・エンターテイメント・センター・アリーナで開催される大規模ライブで、グラミー賞受賞の世界的アイコン、バーナ・ボーイのライブパフォーマンスをぜひご覧ください。

バーナ・ボーイは、音楽史において最も重要かつ革新的なアフリカ系アーティストの一人であり、アフロビート、ポップ、R&B、ヒップホップ、レゲエ、そしてその他あらゆる音楽的アプローチを融合させたトレードマークとして、世界中で高く評価されている文化的巨匠です。

Spotifyで2枚のアルバムが10億回以上のストリーミング再生数を獲得した初のアフリカ系アーティストであるバーナ・ボーイは、7枚のスタジオアルバムをリリースし、グラミー賞11回ノミネート、BETアワード「ベスト・インターナショナル・アクト」4回受賞（アフリカ系アーティストとして初めて3年連続受賞）、2023年ビルボード・ミュージック・アワード「トップ・アフロビート・アーティスト」受賞など、輝かしい功績と称賛を数多く獲得しています。

Disfruta del ícono mundial ganador del GRAMMY® EN VIVO en un espectáculo multitudinario en el Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy es uno de los artistas africanos más significativos e innovadores de la historia de la música, una figura cultural emblemática aclamada mundialmente por su emblemática fusión de afrobeats, pop, R&B, hip-hop, reggae y una amplia gama de otros enfoques musicales.

Burna Boy, el primer artista africano en tener dos álbumes con más de mil millones de reproducciones en Spotify, ha lanzado siete álbumes de estudio y acumulado una extraordinaria lista de logros y reconocimientos, incluyendo 11 nominaciones a los premios GRAMMY®, 4 premios BET a "Mejor Artista Internacional" (el primer artista africano en ganar el premio tres veces consecutivas), un premio Billboard Music Award 2023 a "Mejor Artista Afrobeats" y muchos más.

Erleben Sie die mit einem GRAMMY® ausgezeichnete Weltikone LIVE bei einer großartigen Show in der Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy zählt zu den bedeutendsten und bahnbrechendsten afrikanischen Künstlern der Musikgeschichte und ist eine wegweisende kulturelle Persönlichkeit, die weltweit für ihre charakteristische Verbindung von Afrobeats, Pop, R&B, Hip-Hop, Reggae und einer umfassenden Palette anderer musikalischer Ansätze gefeiert wird.

Als erster afrikanischer Künstler, dessen zwei Alben über eine Milliarde Streams auf Spotify erzielten, hat Burna Boy sieben Studioalben veröffentlicht und eine wahrhaft außergewöhnliche Liste an Erfolgen und Auszeichnungen vorzuweisen, darunter insgesamt elf GRAMMY®-Nominierungen, vier BET Awards als „Best International Act“ (als erster afrikanischer Künstler, der den Preis dreimal in Folge gewann), einen Billboard Music Award 2023 als „Top Afrobeats Artist“ und vieles mehr.

在布里斯班娱乐中心竞技场，现场欣赏这位格莱美奖得主、全球偶像的精彩演出。

伯纳·博伊 (Burna Boy) 是音乐史上最具影响力和开创性的非洲艺术家之一，他是一位里程碑式的文化人物，因其标志性的非洲节奏、流行、R&B、嘻哈、雷鬼以及其他各种音乐风格的融合而受到全世界的赞誉。

伯纳·博伊是第一位拥有两张专辑在 Spotify 上获得超过 10 亿次播放量的非洲艺术家，他已发行了七张录音室专辑，并获得了一系列非凡的成就和荣誉，其中包括 11 项格莱美奖提名、4 项 BET 音乐奖“最佳国际艺人”（首位连续三次获奖的非洲艺术家）、2023 年公告牌音乐奖“最佳非洲节奏艺术家”等等。

Assista ao ícone global vencedor do GRAMMY® AO VIVO em um show grandioso na Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy está entre os artistas africanos mais significativos e inovadores da história da música, uma figura cultural marcante e aclamada mundialmente por sua união marcante de afrobeats, pop, R&B, hip-hop, reggae e uma gama abrangente de outras abordagens musicais.

O primeiro artista africano a ter dois álbuns com mais de 1 bilhão de reproduções no Spotify, Burna Boy lançou sete álbuns de estúdio e acumulou uma lista verdadeiramente extraordinária de conquistas e reconhecimentos, incluindo 11 indicações ao GRAMMY®, 4 prêmios BET de "Melhor Artista Internacional" (o primeiro artista africano a ganhar o prêmio três vezes consecutivas), um prêmio Billboard Music de 2023 de "Melhor Artista de Afrobeats" e muitos outros.

Saksikan ikon global peraih GRAMMY® Award ini secara LANGSUNG dalam pertunjukan megah di Brisbane Entertainment Centre Arena.

Burna Boy adalah salah satu seniman Afrika paling signifikan dan inovatif dalam sejarah musik, seorang tokoh budaya terkemuka yang dipuji di seluruh dunia atas perpaduan khasnya yang memadukan Afrobeats, pop, R&B, hip-hop, reggae, dan beragam pendekatan musik lainnya.

Sebagai seniman Afrika pertama yang dua albumnya meraih lebih dari 1 miliar streaming di Spotify, Burna Boy telah merilis tujuh album studio dan telah mengumpulkan sederet prestasi dan penghargaan yang luar biasa, termasuk total 11 nominasi GRAMMY® Award, 4 BET Awards untuk "Best International Act" (artis Afrika pertama yang memenangkan penghargaan tersebut tiga kali berturut-turut), Billboard Music Award 2023 untuk "Top Afrobeats Artist", dan masih banyak lagi.

在布里斯本娛樂中心競技場，現場欣賞這位葛萊美獎得主、全球偶像的精彩演出。

伯納·博伊 (Burna Boy) 是音樂史上最具影響力和開創性的非洲藝術家之一，他是一位里程碑式的文化人物，因其標誌性的非洲節奏、流行、R&B、嘻哈、雷鬼以及其他各種音樂風格的融合而受到全世界的讚譽。

伯納·博伊是第一位擁有兩張專輯在 Spotify 上獲得超過 10 億次播放量的非洲藝術家，他已發行了七張錄音室專輯，並獲得了一系列非凡的成就和榮譽，其中包括 11 項格萊美獎提名、4 項 BET 音樂獎“最佳國際藝人”（首位連續三次獲獎的非洲藝術家）、2023 年公告牌音樂獎。

productComments.commentText: Paul Reedy of K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba will outline the history of the firm in Toowoomba and a general overview of plumbing in Toowoomba
Paul Reedy de K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba décrira l'histoire de l'entreprise à Toowoomba et un aperçu général de la plomberie à Toowoomba
Toowoomba의 K & R Plumbing의 Paul Reedy는 Toowoomba에 있는 회사의 역사와 Toowoomba의 배관에 대한 일반적인 개요를 간략하게 설명합니다.
Paul Reedy von K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba, wird die Geschichte der Firma in Toowoomba skizzieren und einen allgemeinen Überblick über die Sanitärinstallation in Toowoomba geben.
Paul Reedy di K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba illustrerà la storia dell'azienda a Toowoomba e fornirà una panoramica generale dell'idraulica a Toowoomba
トゥーンバのK＆R配管のポール・リーディ氏が、トゥーンバにおける同社の歴史と、トゥーンバの配管工事の一般的な概要を説明します。
Paul Reedy de K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba describirá la historia de la empresa en Toowoomba y una descripción general de la plomería en Toowoomba.
图文巴 K & R Plumbing 公司的 Paul Reedy 将概述图文巴公司的历史以及图文巴管道的总体概况
圖文巴 K & R Plumbing 公司的 Paul Reedy 將概述圖文巴公司的歷史以及圖文巴管道的整體概況
Paul Reedy dari K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba akan menguraikan sejarah firma di Toowoomba dan gambaran umum tentang perpipaan di Toowoomba
Paul Reedy da K & R Plumbing, Toowoomba, descreverá a história da empresa em Toowoomba e uma visão geral do encanamento em Toowoomba

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: An access and inclusion statement is available (make this available on your website).

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness
Have accessibility information and photos, including of a bathroom, room and/or floor plan on your website (can be emailed on request)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people with learning or behavioural challenges
Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have  Braille and tactile signage on all information and paths of travel
Provide information in large print
Provide information in audio format (includes an audio described map of your venue, audio descs of performances and/ or displays)
Use easy read fonts in your signage and communication materials (Helvetica and Arial)
Have handrails on all your stairways
Have Exit signs which are visible at a ground level (high level signs are difficult to see in a fire)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use floors/coverings which are slip resistant, firm and smooth
Use non-slip tiles in the bathroom or slip resistant matting
Have grab rails in the bathroom
Provide seating in common areas including reception area

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have accessible seating areas in theatrette
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room
Have wheelchair accessible picnic tables (picnic tables require 720mm knee clearance and 800mm maximum height)
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Modify your cooking and cleaning practices to cater for people with food allergies or chemical intolerances (could include menus with meals free from: nuts, dairy, seafood, eggs, gluten etc)
Train your staff to respond to allergic reactions
Adhere to The Food Authority requirements for allergy management in food preparation
Have equipment to respond to anaphylactic shock such as epi–pens and defibrillator

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: An access and inclusion statement is available (make this available on your website).

attributes.attributeIdDescription: https://thestationsc.com.au/accessibility/

productComments.commentText:
Tones And I returns from overseas and announces a handful of all ages acoustic shows for 2025.

Don't miss your chance to see the multi-award winning, record-breaking artist up close and personal. Tickets will sell fast, one night only, don't miss out!

Tones And I revient de l'étranger et annonce une série de concerts acoustiques pour tous les publics en 2025.

Ne manquez pas l'occasion de voir de près cet artiste multi-primé et recordman. Les billets partiront vite, un soir seulement, ne manquez pas cette occasion !

Tones And I retorna do exterior e anuncia alguns shows acústicos para todas as idades em 2025.

Não perca a chance de ver de perto o artista multipremiado e recordista. Os ingressos esgotam rápido, apenas uma noite, não perca!

Tones And I가 해외에서 돌아와 2025년 모든 연령대를 위한 어쿠스틱 공연 몇 개를 발표했습니다.

수많은 수상 경력에 빛나는 신기록을 세운 아티스트를 가까이서 직접 만나볼 기회를 놓치지 마세요. 티켓은 단 하룻밤만 빠르게 매진되니 놓치지 마세요!

Tones And Iが海外公演から帰国し、2025年には全年齢対象のアコースティックライブをいくつか開催することを発表します。

数々の賞を受賞し、記録破りのアーティストを間近で見られるこの機会をお見逃しなく。チケットは一夜限りで完売必至！お見逃しなく！

Tones And I 樂團從海外歸來，宣布將於2025年推出一系列老少皆宜的原聲音樂演出。

切勿錯過近距離欣賞這位屢獲殊榮、屢破紀錄的藝術家的機會。門票售罄在即，僅限一晚，切勿錯過！

Tones And I 乐队从海外归来，宣布将于2025年推出一系列老少皆宜的原声音乐演出。

切勿错过近距离欣赏这位屡获殊荣、屡破纪录的艺术家的机会。门票售罄在即，仅限一晚，切勿错过！

Tones And I torna dall'estero e annuncia una serie di concerti acustici per tutte le età per il 2025.

Non perdete l'occasione di vedere da vicino l'artista pluripremiato e da record. I biglietti andranno a ruba, solo per una serata, non perdeteveli!

Tones And I kehrt aus Übersee zurück und kündigt für 2025 eine Reihe von Akustik-Shows für alle Altersgruppen an.

Verpassen Sie nicht Ihre Chance, den mehrfach preisgekrönten und rekordbrechenden Künstler hautnah zu erleben. Die Tickets sind schnell ausverkauft und nur für eine Nacht gültig. Verpassen Sie es nicht!

Tones And I regresa del extranjero y anuncia varios conciertos acústicos para todas las edades en 2025.

No te pierdas la oportunidad de ver de cerca al artista multipremiado y rompedor de récords. ¡Las entradas se agotan rápido, solo por una noche, no te las pierdas!

Tones And I kembali dari luar negeri dan mengumumkan beberapa pertunjukan akustik untuk segala usia di tahun 2025.

Jangan lewatkan kesempatan Anda untuk menyaksikan artis peraih banyak penghargaan dan pemecah rekor ini dari dekat. Tiket akan terjual dengan cepat, hanya untuk satu malam, jangan sampai ketinggalan!

productComments.commentText: Multicultural Fashion Show, Talent Show in front of Stars and Celebrities. Use this opportunity to come ahead and show case your Talent in the Gold Coast!
Sfilata di moda multiculturale, talent show di fronte a star e celebrità. Approfitta di questa opportunità per farti conoscere e mostrare il tuo talento sulla Gold Coast!
Pertunjukan Busana Multikultural, Pertunjukan Bakat di hadapan Bintang dan Selebritas. Manfaatkan kesempatan ini untuk maju dan menunjukkan Bakat Anda di Gold Coast!
Desfile de Moda Multicultural, Concurso de Talentos frente a estrellas y celebridades. ¡Aprovecha esta oportunidad para presentarte y demostrar tu talento en Gold Coast!
多元文化时装秀，明星名流才艺表演。抓住机会，在黄金海岸展现你的才华！
多元文化時裝秀，明星名流才藝表演。把握機會，在黃金海岸展現你的才華！
Desfile de Moda Multicultural, Show de Talentos para Estrelas e Celebridades. Aproveite esta oportunidade para se antecipar e mostrar seu talento na Gold Coast!
Défilé de mode multiculturel et spectacle de talents devant des stars et des célébrités. Profitez de cette occasion pour venir présenter votre talent sur la Gold Coast !
Multikulturelle Modenschau, Talentshow vor Stars und Prominenten. Nutzen Sie die Gelegenheit, Ihr Talent an der Gold Coast zu präsentieren!
スターやセレブリティが集まる多文化ファッションショー、タレントショー。この機会にゴールドコーストであなたの才能を披露しませんか？
스타와 유명인사들 앞에서 펼쳐지는 다문화 패션쇼와 장기자랑. 이 기회를 놓치지 말고 골드코스트에서 여러분의 재능을 마음껏 뽐내세요!
